"Hey. I heard from someone that you're part of the Advanced Science Society. Is that true?" You asked the girl as she looked blankly at you for a moment before replying.


"Yeah, that's true. Why do you ask?"


"Well, i was interested in becoming a shrinky." The girl seemed to light right up as she grabbed your hand before you could say another word and rushed off with you in tow to their secret hideout.
